body.name: 2 Packs 6040mAh 3.65V Lithium-Ion Rechargeable Battery and USB Charging Station Compatible with Ring, for Video Doorbell 2/3/4 and Spotlight Cam Battery(Not for Spotlight Pro/Plus,Stick Up Cam)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 5 hrs 12 mins
features: 【Ring Rechargeable Battery -2 packs】:The battery has a larger capacity and better price compared to the original battery,suitable for doorbell camera 2/3/4, ring camera battery, spotlight camera(Note: NOT compatible with Spotlight Pro/Plus/Stick Up Cam)

【USB Charging Station】:Dual Charging Docks Allow You To Charge Up To Two Batteries Simultaneously，led Lights Display Charging Status Of Both Batteries.Simply Push The Battery Down Into The Charging Slot To Charge,make sure the battery is charging

【More Secure Protection】: Built-in Multiple Circuit Protection (Over-Charging, Short-Circuit, High-temperature, And Surge Protection) And Fire-resistant Construction Can Ensure Your Safe Charge.3.65V 6040mAh Professional Replacement Battery for Ring.Premium Li-ion Cells for Longer Battery Life with no Memory Effect. Batteries Can be Charged or Discharged at Any Time Without Harm.

【Easy to Charge】: This battery charger using general USB cable and micro usb port input(5V/2.1A),with The 2 Charging Way Of Type-C Port And Micro USB To Connect.Quickly charge 2 ring batteries simultaneously from portable chargers, car chargers, wall chargers,laptops and more. No more worrying about where the charger is.
【WHAT YOU GET】2 Packs *6040mAh Replacement Batteries, 1 *Dual Charging Docks, 24-Month Manufacturer Warranty And 24-Hour Customer Service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Spotlight Cam Pro (2022 Model)
reviews.reviewText: The camera refused to properly boot fully with the batteries. Immediately worked with Ring brand. Ring has clearly added some DRM to their battery tech that some of the models require.Update: the seller has now updated the description to properly note that this does not work with the Pro 2022 model.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great backup batteries
reviews.reviewText: No one wants to run out of battery on their Ring Video just as the menacing clown hops out of his car! Did he go to my neighbors house? Is he coming to mine? Did I hear a noise? Where is my phone! DEAR GOD,PLEASE HELP. No worries here because I have backup batteries and I'll be ready for the killer clown before he gets to the window I forgot to lock!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not very good
reviews.reviewText: They don’t seem to hold a charge at all! It shows they are fully charged so I put them in the ring camera, wait 30 seconds and reattach the bottom of the camera and I still get a notification that battery is low there is no video! Not sure if it’s the base charger or that batteries that aren’t good! I even had the battery plugged directly in with the cord to an outlet to see if that makes a difference and it gave me the same message. I was super excited as I like to be able to just switch out the batteries and go on with my day but I have yet to be able to do that! I though at first it was something I was going wrong so I watched the help video and waited the 30 seconds and it still did the same thing! I am fairly confident it is not operator error! I have not reached out to the seller as of yet but I will and see if there are any tips they can recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t work for any of my 3 stick up cams.
reviews.reviewText: This product can charge batteries as well as charge original ring stick up cam batteries. However, these batteries don’t work for the stick up cams themselves. They didn’t work for any of my 3 stick up cams. After putting the batteries in, they were kind of loose and didn’t click like original batteries do after putting them inside the stick up cam. Inside the ring app it would continuously say batteries are too low and need to be replaced immediately. In other words, the batteries were not being detected despite being fully charged to 100%. I was able to charge the Original ring stick up cam battery with the charging station and after putting the ORIGINAL battery back into the cam, the cam detected battery right away and functioned as normal. I struggled to try to make the non-original batteries work for about 1 hour and they were never detected at all, but ring batteries were detected immediately.After a couple weeks I have decided to update my review from 1 star to 5 star because the seller has been very fair with me. They gave me refund without having to return items due to batteries not working for any of my stick up cams, which are only ring devices I have. They also updated their title and description stating the product does NOT work for stick up cams. Therefore, everything is now updated and true and I am a satisfied customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. and seems to work well with my ring camera. My only issue is it doesnt quite click in fully but im find with that my ring is in a case anyway

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Talk about value
reviews.reviewText: This product is a great value. I was paying $35 just for one extra ring battery. With this pack you get (2) batteries and a charger. Sounds like a great deal to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: When I bought this item, I didn’t realize that there is no return. But I contacts the service and told them that one of the battery wasn’t charging. They worked immediately and got me replacement. The new one arrived and worked well. Good service!!!!
